de.must.middle
Class MustAction

java.lang.Object
  de.must.middle.MustAction

public abstract class MustAction
extends java.lang.Object

Action class - declare actions once, call them by multiple buttons / menu items.

Constructor Detail

MustAction

public MustAction()

MustAction

public MustAction(java.lang.Object causer)
Constructs a new action class. If causer is instance of ThreadDoneListener, ThreadDoneListener is assigned automatically.

Parameters:
causer - the object that causes the action, e.g. a frame

MustAction

public MustAction(java.lang.Object causer,
                  ThreadDoneListener threadDoneListener)
Constructs a new action class. If causer is instance of ThreadDoneListener, ThreadDoneListener is assigned automatically.

Parameters:
causer - the object that causes the action, e.g. a frame
threadDoneListener - the listener for thread done events

run

public final void run()

runInBackground

public final void runInBackground()
Constructs a new thread to call the run method.

runIndividualStuff

protected abstract void runIndividualStuff()
Runs the individual stuff. Sample: 

    AccountPrinting thread = new AccountPrinting();
    thread.setLeser(Global.getInstance().currentReader.getIdentifier());
    startThread(thread, R.getString("Konto-Druck"));

startThread

protected final void startThread(InterruptibleBatchThread thread)
Starts a thread.

Parameters:
thread - the thread to be started

startThread

protected final void startThread(InterruptibleBatchThread thread,
                                 ThreadController threadController)
Starts a thread using a BatchThreadControllerFrame for interrupt opportunity.

Parameters:
thread - the thread to be started
threadController - the thread controller
